name: Mars Race
description:
An exciting car race on Mars. Beat your friend or your own high score!

This game can be played solo or with your friend. 

Player1 Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to break.

Player2 Controls: Arrow Keys to move, Backspace to break.

Solo project - made in September, 2022.

IMPORTANT: The game's resolution is broken on smaller screens. If that is the case for you, play this game on the following LINK.
